description: Gather with friends for a quick 20-minute coffee break at Kaffeekommune, one of Münster’s best cafes for artisanal coffee.

locationInfo.description: Kaffeekommune is known for its excellent coffee, perfect for a brief stop and enjoying a cup with friends.
safetyTips: Stay warm by layering up when stepping outside.
Be mindful of the café’s peak hours.

description: Take a quick 30-minute tour around the iconic Muenster Cathedral, exploring the architecture and history.

locationInfo.description: The Muenster Cathedral is a stunning landmark, and even a brief visit offers a chance to appreciate its grandeur.
safetyTips: Keep quiet and respectful while inside.
Follow any photography guidelines if visiting during services.

description: Capture beautiful moments with a mini photoshoot by the Aasee, taking advantage of the scenic lakeside views in just 30 minutes.

locationInfo.description: The Aasee lake offers a picturesque setting for a short photoshoot with friends, ideal for a quick stop while enjoying nature.
safetyTips: Keep your camera gear safe and dry.
Wear warm clothing as it can get chilly by the lake.

description: Take a quick 25-minute stroll through the Hafenviertel, where you can discover vibrant street art on the walls of the neighborhood.

locationInfo.description: The Hafenviertel district in Münster is famous for its creative street art, making it a perfect destination for a brief cultural walk.
safetyTips: Be aware of traffic while walking around the area.
Wear comfortable shoes for a smooth walk.

activity: Visit to the Muenster Museum of Art
description: Enjoy a brief 30-minute visit to the Muenster Museum of Art, appreciating the modern and contemporary art on display.

locationInfo.description: This museum is a great place to explore modern art in a short amount of time, making it perfect for a group activity on a chilly day.
safetyTips: Respect the artworks by not touching them.
Keep your belongings secure during your visit.
